alert.note: Alert for Cleveland; McClain (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued May 11 at 9:25PM CDT until May 11 at 10:15PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Tornado Warning for... Central Cleveland County in central Oklahoma... West central McClain County in central Oklahoma... * Until 1015 PM CDT. * At 925 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located near Dibble, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Tornado. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. * Locations impacted include... Southern Norman, Purcell, Noble, Slaughterville, Lexington, Goldsby, Dibble, Washington, Cole, and Criner. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 93 and 104. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a storm shelter, safe room or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
